name: Battlelog - Enhanced, Simplified ~UPDATE 06/21/14~
description:
Battlelog enhancer for log-in page and some of the main contents. 

-Removes useless info such as: 
    -footer
    -feedback icon
    -unneeded play buttons under large play icons 
    -terrible log-in page and main page ads 

-Cleans up overall tackiness. 

Feel free to edit and don't forget to credit me; 

P.S: Please leave a review and message me for any corrections and updates and I update revisions accordingly

P.P.S: I don't own medal of Rehash but I try to remove stuff that's universal to battlelog according to where each stuff is to the white space

user.name: anik360

additional_info:
v1.0
- Initial release.

v1.1
-Added new css rule to replace the new overlay background

v1.2
-Added medal of honor battlelog domain
-Removed The stupidly annoying Battlefield 4 money grabber url in battlelog
-Removed the Game activity intro spam message for new players and/or returning users
-Removed the merchandise store link....who needs it anyway
-Removed "Latest News." Only thing latest about it is that it's LATE.
-Thinking of more crap to remove...

v1.2.5
-Removed a line separator that looked very tacky..

v1.3.0
-Updated styles for the new battlelog update for BF4
-Removed everything from the new page and more
-Cleaned and centered the log-in page but kept the buy battlefield link (ask for another update if you want it removed.
-Removed the server notice banner as it is old code and deprecated.

v1.3.1
-Fixed a Critical bug where the stat page would not show because I selected the wrong class to hide
-Changed the background link for the bf3 landing page

v1.3.2
-Added another div to block out the Store link to buy t-shirts and show EA affiliated links.
